title: Removing Barriers to American Leadership in Artificial Intelligence
summary:
The document is an executive order issued by the President on January 23, 2025, titled "Removing Barriers to American Leadership in Artificial Intelligence." The order emphasizes the United States' goal to maintain its global leadership in artificial intelligence (AI) by eliminating existing policies that hinder innovation. It underscores the necessity of developing AI systems free from ideological biases and promotes economic competitiveness, human flourishing, and national security.

Key provisions include the establishment of an action plan to be developed within 180 days by key presidential advisors and agency heads, aimed at achieving the outlined policy goals. The order also mandates a review and potential revocation of previous AI-related directives that conflict with the new policy. Additionally, the Office of Management and Budget is tasked with revising relevant memoranda to align with the new direction.

Overall, this executive order signifies a strategic shift toward fostering AI innovation in the U.S., aiming to enhance its global standing and ensure that future developments in AI are aligned with national interests.
